content.title: The Last Refuge - Page VII
content.body:
Perhaps though, it’s for the better. Perhaps our ancestors are still in hiding; waiting for a time to safely return.
Waiting for the Dragon Tyrant to be slain, and the Necromancer’s powers to fade into oblivion.
Waiting for the great hero of legend to arise, take up the mantle; and slay our ancestors’ ancient foe.
